content: Got it. Don’t you think we are missing this information as well: top projects per country, no matter where stars are coming from? Something like this? Don’t get me wrong; stars are not that important anyway; it’s just that when you are a sole person that invested a lot of himself into something, you would like to see any feedback. To be honest, I felt bit down after this article, as by the numbers my project is not that insignificant; but again, rules are the rules.
